message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. I'm offering you a fair 40% to avoid drawn-out negotiations.
I appreciate the offer, but I think we can do better for both of us. I'm offering you a more equitable 40%, but let's see if we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
Bob, time is literally money for me in this game. I'm willing to meet you halfway to end this now. 55/45, take it or leave it.
